title: Junior ML Assistant
company_profile: HexaTrend is a stealth-mode AI startup focused on ML infrastructure for small businesses.
description: This is a non-traditional entry point into ML. Responsibilities include manual data labeling, tracking model performance, and attending async meetings over Discord.
requirements: Familiarity with Jupyter notebooks. Bonus: GitHub or Kaggle portfolio. Must be comfortable working without daily supervision.
benefits: Flexible hours. No benefits until conversion.

Responsibilities include manual data labeling, tracking model performance, and attending async meetings over Discord. Familiarity with Jupyter notebooks. Bonus: GitHub or Kaggle portfolio. Must be comfortable working without daily supervision. Flexible hours. No benefits until conversion.

title: Remote Data Entry Assistant
company_profile: At SynerCore Analytics, we simplify insights for growing businesses. We’re expanding our global contractor base.
description: Work independently to receive and enter data from clients using Google Sheets. Paid weekly via crypto or PayPal.
requirements: Strong attention to detail. Must have smartphone access. Prior data entry experience a plus.
benefits: Performance bonuses. Flexible work schedule. Crypto payout options.

title: AI Research Associate (Volunteer)
company_profile: A grassroots AI research collective running short-term NLP experiments.
description: Help label and evaluate AI-generated content. All contributions will be acknowledged in open-source publications.
requirements: Interest in machine learning. Basic Python. GitHub for collaboration.
benefits: Unpaid. Learning opportunity with exposure to real-world ML tools.

title: Content Labeling Intern
company_profile: NeuroPulse is an early-stage startup developing emotion-aware content tools.
description: Use our web app to tag images and videos based on pre-defined categories. Work closely with our NLP team.
requirements: Attention to detail. No experience required. Training provided.
benefits: Flexible hours, startup environment. No formal pay during pilot stage.

title: Junior Data Analyst (Entry Level)
company_profile: Brightwell Analytics is a legit firm providing dashboarding solutions to e-commerce companies.
description: Support the analytics team with daily data cleaning tasks and Tableau dashboard updates. Bi-weekly check-ins with mentor.
requirements: Basic SQL. Strong Excel or Google Sheets experience. Must be based in Canada.
benefits: Paid hourly. Training provided. Path to full-time.
